Certificate Of Title.definition: a certificate of ownership stating that the title to the specified property is free and clear except for any encumbrance

1.definition: a certificate of ownership stating that the title to the specified property is free and clear except for any encumbrance (as a mortgage) listed on it

sub_terms.a: a certificate issued by a motor vehicle registry called also
sub_terms.b: a certificate issued by a registry of deeds see also

2.definition: a document issued by a title abstracter (as an attorney) giving a legal opinion as to the status of a property's title based on a title search or abstract of title compare
